message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with lossy source coding and distortion measures, which are topics typically studied in information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.MM). The use of distortion side information also relates to perceptual effects and sensor calibration, which are relevant to signal processing (cs.SI) and computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses transform-based quantizer constructions, which are often used in compression and coding algorithms and fall under the category of machine learning (cs.MM) and optimization (cs.LG).
